page.title: 10Patterns of work.
page.content: The kind of workers who live in our area fall mainly into two groups,i.e. commuters and farm workers.The commuters go to work in the towns and city round about.They travel mostly by car as there are no trains and buses which will stop in the villages.We found out that parents of children in school travel to Hull, Driffield, Beverley, Pocklington and Grimsby to work.These towns are between 6 and 50 miles away.The farm workers work mostly in their home villages but some travel short distances to nearby farms.
